mapper.select: select a.articleId, a.title, a.articleType, a.summary, a.createBy,a.createTime, a.lastUpdBy, a.lastUpdTime from article a left join clicks c on a.articleId = c.articleId where a.articleType = #{articleType }
mapper.update: update subject set difficulty = #{difficulty}, timeLimit = #{timeLimit}, memoryLimit = #{memoryLimit}, otherLimit = #{otherLimit} where articleId = #{articleId}
mapper.select: select tagId, count(articleId) articleNum from article_tags group by tagId
